relation: Darrow3 - #64 As the story shifts back to the adventure, Ness and friends are left wondering what to do next. Fortunately, convenient telepathic visions clear everything up!

Darrow3 - #63 Left with the knowledge of an incredibly powerful weapon, Pokey sets out to prepare for the final battle. While he may be a cowardly child at the moment, eventually Pokey will be capable of standing on the battlefield rather than running from it.

Darrow3 - #62 Too broken to even think straight, Giygas has no choice but to retreat back into the Devil's Machine. His only chance now is for his closest ally, Pokey, to act as his right hand man in leading the assault against Ness.

Darrow3 - #61 Having had his body crack away, Giygas is reduced to a mass of flesh that can twist and reshape, but never return to its original form. The hatred and darkness that have driven him up until now are all that keep him going anymore.
Darrow3 - #60 Lost in his insanity, Giygas has a serious identity crisis that, unfortunately for Pokey, may just end up traumatizing him.
